name: Inoreader Tags to Colours
description:
Articles will change colour according to tags. Neat.

Perfect for fast organising of articles.

Pay attention to instructions below...
additional_info:
*NOTE - you must edit the code yourself so that tag names match those in your Inoreader.

At the moment there are just generic tag names, like 'tag1', 'tag2', 'tag3' etc.
